excerpt: A tangy and sweet treat that's vegan-friendly

instructions.name: Crust
instructions: In a food processor, pulse together flour, powdered sugar, and salt.
Add the cubed vegan butter and vanilla extract and pulse until the dough forms a ball.
Press the dough into an 8-inch square baking pan.
Bake the crust for 15-20 minutes, until lightly golden brown.

instructions.name: Filling
instructions: In a food processor or blender, combine the drained tofu, cornstarch, lemon juice, lemon zest, sugar, vanilla extract, and salt until smooth.
Pour the filling over the crust and smooth out with a spatula.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the filling is set and the edges are lightly golden brown.
Let cool at room temperature for 30 minutes, then refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
Once chilled, cut into bars, dust with powdered sugar, and serve.
